sentence: We were asked our opinion of the food and the service on each occasion that we sat down for dinner
If you eat every meal at the resort you will probably get bored after a few days so I would recommend getting off property
Plus if they are offering up free mimosas and snacks we are there
If you did n’t finish the bottle the staff would save it for you for another dinner meal
I also felt the ever present hotline for property sales and brochures in the bar and room to be rather cheesy for a room that costs approximately 70 a night
I read but did n’t detect any effort to control them other than the presence of cans of Off in the room at the bar and at all the restaurants

The Rosewood Sugar Mill restaurant is a great restauarant which was unexpected compared to the years spent at Canel Bay St Johns which has recently had a change of owners no longer a Rosewood resort about 2 years ago
That particular dinner I was somewhat disappointed with
Less than five minutes I had two apples on a plate plus a smile
We bought the meal plan for Breakfast and Dinner did not do lunch because we knew we would eat plenty
When it gets near dinner time 7 pm take a sunset tiny ferry boat from Bitter End Yacht Clubs pier to the tiny Saba Rock for dinner and drinks
Had our anniversary dinner on the beach under the moon and stars

The food is delicious can be eating steak and lobster every day with the meal plan wish I recommend since there is no much to do or places to eat on the island other than to spend a day at one of the untouchable beaches
The food was remarkably good menus seem to capture local and global flavors
Food was very good especially the lamb chops the menu needs to be expanded if you are eating there for a whole week
The Food was very good especially the lamb chops the menu needs to be expanded if you are eating there for a whole week
The buffet breakfast was excellent
The beach menu was the best in my opinion
Klara at the restaurants was so happy and lovely to see and happy to be working
The Beach drops offs with a picnic lunch are a real treat and should not be missed
We also want to highlight exceptional service by the spa Calvin and Coy at the restaurants the beach service providers and the tennis professional
She escorted us to our room and asked about dinner
This is something new to me where literally everything you do in terms of meal reservations special requests breakfast orders go through this one indivdual
